<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Beckoning Cat Amulet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=582)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 26 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use a feat or ability to reroll a failed or critically failed Reflex saving throw (such as [Cat’s Luck](/Monsters.aspx?ID=71) or [Halfling Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=54)).

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clay figurine resembles a white cat with a paw outstretched. When it’s activated, any allies within 10 feet who also just failed or critically failed a Reflex saving throw from the same source (such as a [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) spell) can also reroll their saving throw and use the better result.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Beckoning Cat Amulet
